prompts: Create a ghostly sword Pokemon with a shimmering blade and floating features.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a knight with a metallic shield.
Generate a dual-type Pokemon with a regal appearance and a mystical aura.
Make an elegant Pokemon that resembles a sword and has a ghostly presence.
Imagine a ghost-type Pokemon that has a metallic body and a haunting design.
Design a Pokemon that looks like a weapon but has a playful spirit.
Show me a knightly Pokemon with a combination of steel and ghostly elements.
